channel.title: I remember
channel.description:
I remember, when I joined rs2 cheating. Coding was fun and it was a challage. All people were willing to help, and you didn't get called a noob. This was at kaitnieks.
I remember how the forums were clean, I remember how there were no flame wars.
I remember when aryan ruined it all.
I remember that's what brought all the noobs in and caused it. No one has a craving to code. Everyone now expects someone else to do the work for them to cheat.
I remember RSC. Same way.
I remember kaitnieks. Kaitnieks was where it was at. I loved that site. I always got the best feedback to improve my java programming level.
I remember it all...

item.title: I remember
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

james:

You may not have been active but being in the AR crew is a hell of alot better than helping some newbies with private servers and getting like 50 rep in a couple of days. I mean i got rep for telling a newb to go to the private server tuts

Just give it up.

Read full topic

item.title: I remember
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

james:

youd think a AR crew member would at least deserve a community member rank. Then you get people who do nothing who have 50+ rep… tis sad times

First of all, I have never been active on forums and will continue not to be becuase i do lots of other things. People who do get community member do deserve it becuase they always have done something to deserve it, So I wouldn’t say they have done nothing.

The community members here were extremely helpfull people on kaitnieks or ones caught in the private server buisness

Read full topic
